*div1 type="summary"* *p*Mrs. E. M. Perry to Austin, Potosi, about July 1, 1828. Local news.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[About July 1, 1828.]*/p* *p*My Dear *person_mentioned*Stephen */person_mentioned*,*/p* *p*We received your letter of *date_mentioned n="03-31-1828">March 31st*/date_mentioned*, which was most welcome, for it was better than *date_mentioned n="03-xx-1827">twelve months*/date_mentioned* since we had recived a line from eather your or *person_mentioned*Brown*/person_mentioned*, I had began to think that the unfavourable reports that we heard was true or that you had got so much taken up Colonizing that your *person_mentioned*Sister */person_mentioned*was forgotten; you accuse me of neglect, and forgitfullness you sencure me wrongfully my Dear *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned*, your are never absent from my thoughts; often O! how often do I think of you, and lament that we cannot meet once in a while, if you could only look in on me, and see what a *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*I am surrounded with, you would not be surprised that every moment of my time was Imploy'd. I shoud of writen you oftener but *person_mentioned*Mr. Perry*/person_mentioned* being obliged to write on business, thought that it would be just the same as if I had written myself, I wil indeavor to write to you of tener in filter; but you do not receive all the letters, that are sent to you I wrote you a very long letter by *person_mentioned*Mr. John McCormick,*/person_mentioned* and also wrote to you by*person_mentioned* James Cole*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="WInter - 1827">last winter*/date_mentioned* neather of those letters I dont expect you have ever received, as I have heard that the men never went to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, so you see My Dear *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*that you are still remembered by your *person_mentioned*Sister */person_mentioned*and all your old *person_mentioned*Friends*/person_mentioned*; *person_mentioned*Judge Carr*/person_mentioned* is now hear, he always inquires very particularly after you, he is still a *person_mentioned*Widdower*/person_mentioned*, his Daugh [ter] *person_mentioned*Maria*/person_mentioned*, I am told has grown up a very pretty and Amiable Girl, she keeps house for her *person_mentioned*father*/person_mentioned*, and you know how particular he is, *person_mentioned*Verginia */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Cordelia */person_mentioned*are also with him he has but three *person_mentioned*Children*/person_mentioned*, and Welthy— *person_mentioned*Adeline Lewis*/person_mentioned* is also a Widdowe with one *person_mentioned*Child */person_mentioned*a Girl, she keeps house for her *person_mentioned*Father*/person_mentioned*, in *location_mentioned*Herculaneum*/location_mentioned*— *person_mentioned*Elias */person_mentioned*looks old he is inclined to be disapated, him and *person_mentioned*Honey */person_mentioned*are still ingaged in manufacturing Shot but do not do the business that they formily did. *location_mentioned*H[erculaneum]*/location_mentioned* I am told looks as if it was poverty struck, business is very dull every where, led is low, the *location_mentioned*Fever River mines*/location_mentioned* have drawn great numbers of the *person_mentioned*miners */person_mentioned*from this part of the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, the *person_mentioned*Cir. Court*/person_mentioned* sits hear this week the Suit of *person_mentioned*Price agaisnt the Perrys*/person_mentioned* comes on. the *person_mentioned*Supreme Court*/person_mentioned* gave it against *person_mentioned*price*/person_mentioned*, but that did not sattisfye him, and he has now sued *person_mentioned*Ruggles */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Samuel */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*John */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*James Perry*/person_mentioned*, God knows how it wil terminate this time *person_mentioned*Price */person_mentioned*since he has been in possession of the *location_mentioned*Mine A Burton Propperty*/location_mentioned* has nearly extricated himself from debt; their has been an immencé quantity of mineral raised off of that land, and still continue to make discoverys, it is the opinion of all your old *person_mentioned*Friends */person_mentioned*that if you would come on, their might be something done in the business. I cannot se for my part why you cant visit *location_mentioned*Missouri*/location_mentioned*, what are you spending toiling and labouring your life a way for in that Wild *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*you have no *person_mentioned*Family */person_mentioned*to provide for, is it possible that you cannot relize a nought [enough] (after incountering all you have for several year back) to ennable you to Visit and Spend a few months, with those old *person_mentioned*Friends */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*acquaintances */person_mentioned*that never will for git you, you ought to recollect that our *person_mentioned*Family */person_mentioned*are a very short lived race, a few years more and we shall be mouldering in the dust with our *person_mentioned*fore Fathers*/person_mentioned*— why then my Dear *person_mentioned*Stephen */person_mentioned*will you bury yourself in that *location_mentioned*remote region*/location_mentioned*, your life is pretty well spent few years more you will be 40—you are now alone not incumbered with a *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*— You have now open'd the road for *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*and since he has made Choice of a *person_mentioned*companion */person_mentioned*to share with him the cares and vexation of the troublsome world, it is necessary that he should make evry exertion to make himself comfortable and independent; but you my dear *person_mentioned*Stephen */person_mentioned*have no one but your self, and is it possible that after an absence of so many year that you cannot visit your *person_mentioned*Sister*/person_mentioned*, who you very well know cannot go to see you I have thought a great deal on this subject and have almost concled within myself that you have lost all desire to see me or my *person_mentioned*children */person_mentioned*again I am very well convincd that *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*and his *person_mentioned*Lady */person_mentioned*will visit me, if kind Providence will only Smile on them I am in hopes that we shall be able to git some thing from *person_mentioned*Fox */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr. Learning*/person_mentioned* says that the *location_mentioned*estate */location_mentioned*is worth 6 or 7 thousand Dollars, and that he thinks *person_mentioned*Fox */person_mentioned*will compromise—which will be much better than going to Law, I wish My Dear S. that you would try and settle and arrange your busines so that you could spend the *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1828">nex Fall*/date_mentioned* and *date_mentioned n="Winter - 1828">Winter */date_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Missouri*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*[E. M. Perry.]*/p*
*/div1*
